long_description: Keep the Fenix TK15 LED flashlight close by for a bright, reliable beam that will light up the night while you're camping, hiking or waiting out a power outage. Featuring 4 brightness settings, the flashlight has a single high-quality LED that outputs 400 lumens on turbo and 6 lumens on low. Deep-dish reflector projects a powerful focused beam up to 252m (827 ft.) on turbo. Strobe mode outputs 400 lumens and is great for signaling. Operates on 2 CR123A lithium batteries (included) or one 18650 rechargeable lithium-ion battery (sold separately). Batteries provide up to 2 hrs. of use on turbo, 6 hrs. on high, 21 hrs. on mid and 171 hrs. on low. Tail cap switch allows momentary on for quick blasts of light; dimmer switch on the side lets you set the light output at the setting you need. Regulated output maintains consistent light output over the lifetime of the batteries. Rugged hard-anodized aircraft-grade aluminum body will stand up to regular use in the outdoors; body is designed to resist rolling. Flashlight has an IPX8 water resistance rating for protection against prolonged immersion in water deeper than 1m (3.3 ft.). Fenix TK15 LED flashlight includes a body clip, lanyard, holster, a spare rubber switch boot and a spare O-ring.
short_description: Keep the Fenix TK15 LED flashlight close by for a bright, reliable beam that will light up the night while you're camping, hiking or waiting out a power outage.
